reviewText: Great deal and shipped fast! Three awesome movies for the price of one. Very satisfied with my purchase. Look forward to buying more in the future.
3 good movies for the price of 1! I think I paid under $15 for these blu-rays. The three movies come in one case, with 3 separate discs. Good buy if you can get if for cheap!
It is good that u ever see and the quality is good enough. I will suggest others buying this thank you
I am rating this 5 stars based on the price for the movies. Everyone likes something different so I won't get into reviewing the movies. Came when it was supposed to and for three movies its a steal.

GREAT combo pack! All the movies on this 3-pack are great. I had seen 2 of the 3 (not Green Zone) and was totally worth the proce even for just 2 great films. After watching Green Zone I am even MORE pleased with this purchase. AWESOME gift for a guy.
Green zone bluray came with hiccup. While you watch the movie it skips or video bounces in a way that it's not normal
All 3 movies are just different enough to keep you watching.  Matt Damon is always good, Jamie Foxx is surprising and Jake Gyllenhal is getting better in action movies.
Good movies which didn't get the coverage they should have.  I highly recommend them.
Great Deal !

Awesome package with 3 movies for a low price.

This isn't really a review, but as I found the product description lacking, I decided to compile this list of helpful information below. I hope this will be useful for prospective buyers to know what they're getting:

JARHEAD (2005): 125 minutes - Director: Sam Mendes - Starring: Jake Gylenhaal, Peter Sarsgaard, Jamie Foxx - Genre: War, drama - Plot: Based on former Marine Anthony Swofford's best-selling 2003 book about his pre-Desert Storm experiences in Saudi Arabia and about his experiences fighting in Kuwait. R

THE KINGDOM (2007): 110 minutes - Director: Peter Berg - Starring: Jamie Foxx, Chris Cooper, Jennifer Garner - Genre: Action, war - Plot: A team of U.S. government agents is sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East. R

GREEN ZONE (2010): 115 minutes - Director: Peter Greengrass - Starring: Matt Damon, Jason Isaacs - Genre: War, drama - Plot: Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region. R

Now let's crunch some numbers. This collection costs $13.22, and contains 3 films. To find the value of the individual film you're getting, we divide the price by the number of films to get an individual price of $4.40 per film, a steal for this well-crafted and action-packed set of Iraqi war films! I hope this information is useful to you. Cheers!
Three solid movies at a great price!  What's not to like?

i haven't received the package yet, but the one reason i bought this is because of Jarhead. but the other thing that made me buy this instead of just the single disc Jarhead is because it was only $2 more and 2 more movies that come with it. for the price this is an amazing deal!
